Hi guys newbie here..how long does lala move need for them to credit the money into our acct?
3 to 9 days. The money is credited on the first Wednesday after the first sunday(2330) after the cashout request.
If you cashout now you get it next Wednesday.
If customer complain due to item damage when we riding to deliver there and ask us to refund
